Class UCLeftBottomContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.models.ContentPaneModel
      • BT.models.ButtonPaneModel
        • BT.modules.UC.UCLeftBottomContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToggleButtonsInterface

    public final class UCLeftBottomContent
extends ButtonPaneModel
    Class for creating LeftBottom pane that holds 3 jtoggle buttons
    Author:
    Karel Hala

    • Constructor Detail

      • UCLeftBottomContent

        public UCLeftBottomContent()
        Contructor, that creates grid of 4 rows and 1 column a fill them with jtogglebuttons.

      • UCLeftBottomContent

        public UCLeftBottomContent(UCMainContentController UCMain)
        Contructor, that creates grid of 4 rows and 1 column a fill them with jtogglebuttons. Creates maincontentPane as jpanel with 4 rows.
        Parameters:
        UCMain - UCMainContentController calls parent's constructor with UCMainContentController.

    • Method Detail

      • createMainPane

        public void createMainPane()
        Method that will create main content pane. It will add to this pane 4 jtoggle buttons, these buttons are specified byt lineType enum.
